description: This testcase tests if increase property task actions added on task gets triggered at start of the task during job execution

    @allure.title("Test to verify that the Increase Property Task Actions works as expected during execution")
    @allure.description("This testcase tests if increase property task actions added on task gets triggered at "
                        "start of the task during job execution")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cuj0knf")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.increase_property_task_action_triggered_at_start_of_task
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01")]),
                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_increase_property_task_action_triggered_at_start_of_task(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by,
                                                                      users_list):
        process_data = self.process_obj.test_add_increase_property_task_action_at_the_start_of_task()
        object_data, display_name = object_type_objects.test_create_objects(
            {process_data["properties"]["title_display_name"]: "Object-01",
             process_data["properties"]["single_line_property"]: "single_line",
             process_data["properties"]["multi_line_property"]: "multi_line",
             process_data["properties"]["number_property"]: "10",
             process_data["properties"]["multi_select_property"]: [
                 process_data["properties"]["multi_select_option"]],
             process_data["properties"]["single_select_property"]: process_data["properties"][
                 "single_select_option"],
             process_data["properties"]["date_property"]: "12-12-2012"},
            process_data["properties"]["display_name"])
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
    
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["res_param_01"],
                                       data={"value": object_data["displayName"]})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["number_param"], data={"value": "10"})
        # self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["should_be_param"], data={"value": "10"})
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_02)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_02, process_data["slt_param_01"], data={"value": "Leucine"})
        if not self.job_obj.validate_value_of_object_for_specific_object_property(display_name,
                                                                                  object_data["displayName"],
                                                                                  process_data["properties"][
                                                                                      "number_property"], "20.0"):
            raise AssertionError("Increase property task action is not working as expected")
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_02)
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_03)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_03, process_data["slt_param_02"], data={"value": "Leucine"})
        if not self.job_obj.validate_value_of_object_for_specific_object_property(display_name,
                                                                                  object_data["displayName"],
                                                                                  process_data["properties"][
                                                                                      "number_property"], "40.0"):
            raise AssertionError("Increase property task action is not working as expected")
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_03)
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_04)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_04, process_data["slt_param_03"], data={"value": "Leucine"})
        if not self.job_obj.validate_value_of_object_for_specific_object_property(display_name,
